contentrichtext.text: {{Notability|date=May 2008}} '''''The National Environmental Directory''''' is the biggest directory of [[natural environment|environment]]al [[Non-governmental organization|NGO]]s in the [[United States|U.S.]], currently listing over 13,000 organizations. It is maintained by [[Harbinger Communications]], who started developing their first environmental directory back in 1978. The directory is available online (free) and also as a [[FileMaker Pro]] template (for a price). The Marian Gould Gallagher Law Library of the [[University of Washington]] School of Law chose the website as "Website of the Week for Jan. 26, 2004". [http://lib.law.washington.edu/webweek/2004/Jan26.html] ==See also== *[[National Registry of Environmental Professionals]] (NREP) (in the US) ==External links== *http://www.environmentaldirectory.net [[Category:Environmental websites]] [[Category:Directories]] [[Category:Online databases]] {{US-org-stub}}
